Class AnagramPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • AnagramPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AnagramPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel containing components needed for entry of a string and output of all anagrams of that string. Also contains the thread which will calculate those anagrams,
    Author:
    Daniel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
